Eovaldi’s strength this season is his walk rate, 2.06 per nine IP. That’s well below his career rate to 2.54. Note that the Guardians rank […]

entry.title: Best Batter Today
entry.summary: Once again, the top five remain the same in the Baseball Musings Batter Rankings. Aaron Judge and Juan Soto of the Yankees stand one and two respectively after a 6-0 win over the Guardians. entry.title: The giant of fast fashion Shein is suing its ultracheap rival Temu
entry.summary: The two discount retailers have been battling it out in court for months, accusing each other of intimidation, theft and fraud. Both ship much of their items directly from China

entry.title: Can Alabama prosecute someone for helping people travel out of state for an abortion?
entry.summary: Abortion rights advocates and providers are suing Alabama Attorney General Steve Marshall, seeking to block him from prosecuting people who help patients travel outside the state to end pregnancies.

entry.title: An Arkansas court blocks abortion vote
entry.summary: An Arkansas court blocked an effort to let voters decide on whether the state should legalize abortion - meaning the state's ban remains in place.

entry.title: Court to decide who can see secret evidence U.S. has filed against TikTok
entry.summary: The fate of TikTok in the U.S. will be determined by a high-stakes court hearing set for September. But TikTok is demanding the government turn over its classified documents on the app.

entry.title: Supreme Court grants GOP bid to require citizenship proof for some Arizona voters
entry.summary: The U.S. Supreme Court has for now granted a Republican request to require Arizona voters to submit proof of their U.S. citizenship when using the state’s registration form.
